name: PhiRemoval Enzyme Power
description: Developed with special modifying tattoo removal agents, it deeply acts on the treated area, without damaging the skin if used properly. The micro enzymes in this formula gradually remove the tattoo pigment from skin, achieving the desired effect in a timely manner. **The product should be used by trained professionals only. In case of unprofessional handling it may occur skin damage. For safety reasons, PhiRemoval products are strictly available only to certified PHIREMOVAL  studentsFor approval send your certificate to info@phishop.com
